page.title: 08FAMILY CARS IN DARLINGTON
page.content: From a sample survey we found out that most of Darlington people have English cars.The most popular English car is the Ford.The most popular foreign car is the Fiat. In our area survey we found that most people buy cars that are between Â£3,000 to Â£8,ooo, but there are very few who buy cars costing more than Â£14,ooo. The Jaguar is the most expensive English car.People like them but not many people buy them because of their price.They cost about Â£23,000. A common family car would probably have a petrol engine with a size of about one and a half litres.Most cars could fit about four or more people in.The cars now are used for things like shopping,travelling to work,or sometimes to go on a weekend outing.
